mapper.sql: id, createdAt, updatedAt, isEnable, companyName, unifiedSocialCreditCode, supplierType, supplierLevel, headOfSalesName, headOfSalesIdCard, headOfSalesPhoneNumber, headOfSalesEmail, headOfSalesPassword, idCardPhotocopy, activeCode, remark, approverId, result, status

supplier_register.id AS id, supplier_register.createdAt AS createdAt, supplier_register.updatedAt AS updatedAt, supplier_register.isEnable AS isEnable, supplier_register.companyName AS companyName, supplier_register.unifiedSocialCreditCode AS unifiedSocialCreditCode, supplier_register.supplierType AS supplierType, supplier_register.supplierLevel AS supplierLevel, supplier_register.headOfSalesName AS headOfSalesName, supplier_register.headOfSalesIdCard AS headOfSalesIdCard, supplier_register.headOfSalesPhoneNumber AS headOfSalesPhoneNumber, supplier_register.headOfSalesEmail AS headOfSalesEmail, supplier_register.headOfSalesPassword AS headOfSalesPassword, supplier_register.idCardPhotocopy AS idCardPhotocopy, supplier_register.activeCode AS activeCode, supplier_register.remark AS remark, supplier_register.approverId AS approverId, supplier_register.result AS result, supplier_register.status AS status
mapper.update:
UPDATE supplier_register
createdAt = #{createdAt},
updatedAt = #{updatedAt},
isEnable = #{isEnable},
companyName = #{companyName},
unifiedSocialCreditCode = #{unifiedSocialCreditCode},
supplierType = #{supplierType},
supplierLevel = #{supplierLevel},
headOfSalesName = #{headOfSalesName},
headOfSalesIdCard = #{headOfSalesIdCard},
headOfSalesPhoneNumber = #{headOfSalesPhoneNumber},
headOfSalesEmail = #{headOfSalesEmail},
headOfSalesPassword = #{headOfSalesPassword},
idCardPhotocopy = #{idCardPhotocopy},
activeCode = #{activeCode},
remark = #{remark},
approverId = #{approverId},
result = #{result},
status = #{status},
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE supplier_register SET isEnable = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE supplier_register SET isEnable = FALSE WHERE id = #{id}
